name: lambda-precognition
description: Event handler implementing Laravel precognition protocol and perform backend validation.
author: sot1986 <matteo.presot@gmail.com> (https://presot-studio.it)

scripts.release: npm run test:once && npm run lint && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release:locally: npm run test:once && npm run lint && npm run build && npm pack && mv lambda-precognition-*.tgz ../Released
